lead_paragraph: Marian Hossa had his third assist on Slava Kozlov’s second goal of the game 1 minute 48 seconds into overtime yesterday, lifting the visiting Atlanta Thrashers to a 3-2 victory against the Ottawa Senators.
snippet: Marian Hossa had his third assist on Slava Kozlov’s second goal of the game 1 minute 48 seconds into overtime yesterday, lifting the visiting Atlanta Thrashers to a 3-2 victory against the Ottawa Senators.
